column2: Hiba Green Crepe Jacquard Fashion Saree
column19:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • Blending regal style embroidery with delicate fabric
column20:
this saree from Hiba is party perfect. Style this piece with jhumkas and a gold toned neck-piece for a wedding party. Line your eyes with kohl and paint your lips a bright red to complete the look.

  • Product Details

  • Green and white shaded saree
column21:
has a contrast panel at the border with thread embroidery and lace detailing along it
Comes with a blouse piece
The model is wearing a blouse from our stylist's collection. See the final image for a mock-up of what the actual blouse would look like

  • Material & Care

  • Synthetic crepe jacquard
    Dry clean

  • Size & Fit

  • Length: 5.5 metres plus 0.8 metres blouse piece
    Width: 1.1 metres
